mapper.select: select count(*) from BD_BUILDING t where t.delete_flag = 0

select t.building_no as buildingNo, t.building_name as buildingName from BD_BUILDING t where t.delete_flag = 0
and t.CREATE_STAFF_ID = #{createStaffId}
select count(distinct t.customer_no) from BD_BUILDING_CUSTOMER_RP t join BD_BUILDING b on t.building_no=b.building_no where t.delete_flag = '0' and b.delete_flag = '0'

select count(*) from BD_CUSTOMER_BUSINESS a join BD_CUSTOMER b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id join (select distinct c.customer_no from BD_BUILDING_CUSTOMER_RP c join BD_BUILDING d on c.building_no = d.building_no where d.delete_flag = '0' and c.delete_flag = '0'
) e on b.customer_no = e.customer_no

select a.BUSINESS_TYPE from BD_CUSTOMER_BUSINESS a join BD_CUSTOMER b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id join (select distinct c.customer_no from BD_BUILDING_CUSTOMER_RP c join BD_BUILDING d on c.building_no = d.building_no where d.delete_flag = '0' and c.delete_flag = '0'
) e on b.customer_no = e.customer_no

select a.BUSINESS_TYPE from BD_CUSTOMER_BUSINESS a join BD_CUSTOMER b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id join (select distinct c.customer_no from BD_BUILDING_CUSTOMER_RP c join BD_BUILDING d on c.building_no = d.building_no where d.delete_flag = '0' and c.delete_flag = '0' and d.building_no = #{buildingNo}) e on b.customer_no = e.customer_no

select sum(a.month_fee) from BD_CUSTOMER_BUSINESS a join BD_CUSTOMER b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id join (select distinct c.customer_no from BD_BUILDING_CUSTOMER_RP c join BD_BUILDING d on c.building_no = d.building_no where d.delete_flag = '0' and c.delete_flag = '0'
) e on b.customer_no = e.customer_no
